post:
bodHOST has been a pioneer in the web hosting space for more than 10 years now. Our windows hosting plans coupled with cloud technology gives your business the edge it has been lacking. Our windows hosting plans are optimized with the latest hardware, so that you can concentrate on upscaling your business.

Listed below are the Windows VPS plans being offered:

VPS Basic

  • CPU: 2 vCPUs
  • HDD: 40 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1TB
  • RAM: 2 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $34.99/month

VPS Standard

  • CPU: 4 vCPUs
  • HDD: 60 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1.5 TB
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $49.99/month

VPS Enterprise

  • CPU: 6 vCPUs
  • HDD: 80 GB
  • Bandwidth: 2 TB
  • RAM: 6 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $64.99/month

VPS Corporate

  • CPU: 8 vCPUs
  • HDD: 100 GB
  • Bandwidth: 3 TB
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $79.99/month

Operating System:


  • Linux OS: CentOS 6.x and 7.x / Fedora / Debian / Ubuntu
  • Windows OS: Windows 2012 R2 Standard

Control Panels:

  • CPanel/WHM with Softaculous: $12.00
  • Plesk Web Admin Edition: FREE
  • Plesk Web App Edition: $4.00
  • Plesk Web Pro Edition: $6.00
  • Plesk Web Host Edition: $10.00
